welcome_desc: An easy tool to convert trial balance into financial statements and analysis — by Moataz Madkour
input_desc: Upload trial balance file or enter manually then go to Dashboard.
analysis_desc: See financial statements, ratios and charts instantly.
reports_desc: Export financial statements and reports to Excel or PDF.
note_local: Data is stored locally in your browser — no server storage.
note_template: Use the trial balance template in Input page to avoid format errors.
support_desc: For support or report an issue: open GitHub Issue.
